package.name: Best of Goa
package.itinerary:
Day 1 - Arrival in Goa
				Arrival at the aiport and transfer from airport to the Hotel (On Sharing Basis).
				Day 2 - Full Day Sightseeing of South Goa
				Full day sightseeing covering - Old Goa Churches, Dona Paula, Miramar Beach, Shopping at Panjim, Lunch at Spice Plantation - at extra cost, Mandovi River Cruise at extra cost(On Sharing Basis).
				Day 3 - Day at Leisure
				Your Full Day is at Leisure.
				Day 4 - Departure from Goa
				Transfers from Hotel to Airport (On Sharing Basis).

package.name: Sarthak Resort, Manali - Volvo
package.itinerary:
Day 1 - Delhi - Manali Volvo (Overnight)
				Overnight Journey Delhi to Manali.
				Day 2 - Manali-Hidimba Devi Temple-Vashist Hot Water Springs-Van Vihar-Hongkong Market and the Tibetan Monastery
				Day 3 - Manali-Sollang valley
				Day 4 - Manali-Kullu
				Day 5 - Manali - Delhi Volvo (Overnight)

package.name: Utopia Resort Manali Volvo - Ex Delhi
package.itinerary:
Day 1 - Delhi - Manali Volvo (Overnight)
				Day 2 - Manali-Hidimba Devi Temple-Tibetan Monastery-Hongkong Market
				Day 3 - Visit Sollang Valley
				Day 4 - Visit Kullu-Manali
				Day 5 - Manali - Delhi Volvo (Overnight)

package.name: Astounding Manali with Flight - Ex Delhi
package.itinerary:
Day 1 - Drive from Delhi to Manali (570 km/approx. 14 hours)
				Day 2 - Trip to Rohtang Pass ( On Direct Payment)
				Day 3 - Sightseeing in Manali
				Day 4 - Drive from Manali to Chandigarh (325 km/approx. 8 hours)
				After breakfast, drive to Delhi for the return journey. TOUR ENDS.

package.name: Mini Andaman
package.itinerary:
Day 1 - Port Blair Pickup From Airport - Corbyn's Cove Beach - Cellular Jail Light and Sound Show
				Day 2 - Hotel to Port Blair Harbour - Pickup from Havelock Harbour - Visit Radha Nagar Beach
				Day 3 - Havelock - Elephant Beach
				Day 4 - Depart Form Havelock Harbour - Port Blair Harbour to Hotel - Enjoy Shopping
				Day 5 - Depart from Port Blair
